channel.title: Cfg
channel.description:
Hello I'm using Runefusion, and i was adding fletching stuff into 'Items-on-Items.config' and i added this, bow string on shortbow(u) = shortbow. i added it in correctly and it wasnt working, (also the already added things in there don't work.)
So i assume there is something wrong with my config files, so i was hoping if anyone could help me.
Thanks

item.title: Cfg
item.dc:creator: @Marglarg Marglarg
item.description:
